Members

(static, readonly) MSGEVENT :number

The 'value' property of "msg_event" events emitted by a Session()
Type:
  • number
Properties:
Name Type Description
NONE number 0
ENCRYPTION_REQUIRED number 1 - Our policy requires encryption but we are trying to send an unencrypted message out.
ENCRYPTION_ERROR number 2 - An error occured while encrypting a message and the message was not sent.
CONNECTION_ENDED number 3 - Message has not been sent because our contact has ended the private conversation. We should either end the connection, or refresh it.
SETUP_ERROR number 4 - A private conversation could not be set up. A gcry_error_t will be passed.
MSG_REFLECTED number 5 - Received our own OTR messages.
MSG_RESENT number 6 - The previous message was resent.
RCVDMSG_NOT_IN_PRIVATE number 7 - Received an encrypted message but cannot read it because no private connection is established yet.
RCVDMSG_UNREADABLE number 8 - Cannot read the received message.
RCVDMSG_MALFORMED number 9 - The message received contains malformed data.
LOG_HEARTBEAT_RCVD number 10 - Received a heartbeat.
LOG_HEARTBEAT_SENT number 11 - Sent a heartbeat.
RCVDMSG_GENERAL_ERR number 12 - Received a general OTR error. The argument 'message' will also be passed and it will contain the OTR error message.
RCVDMSG_UNENCRYPTED number 13 - Received an unencrypted message. The argument 'message' will also be passed and it will contain the plaintext message.
RCVDMSG_UNRECOGNIZED number 14 - Cannot recognize the type of OTR message received.
RCVDMSG_FOR_OTHER_INSTANCE number 15 - Received and discarded a message intended for another instance.
name function method to convert MSGEVENT number to string
Source:
  • otr.js, line 66

(static, readonly) POLICY :number

The available values used for the policy parameter of an otr Session()
Type:
  • number
Properties:
Name Type Description
NEVER number
ALLOW_V1 number
ALLOW_V2 number
ALLOW_V3 number
REQUIRE_ENCRYPTION number
SEND_WHITESPACE_TAG number
WHITESPACE_START_AKE number
ERROR_START_AKE number
VERSION_MASK number ALLOW_V1 | ALLOW_V2 | ALLOW_V3
OPPORTUNISTIC number VERSION_MASK | SEND_WHITESPACE_TAG | WHITESPACE_START_AKE | ERROR_START_AKE
MANUAL number VERSION_MASK
ALWAYS number VERSION_MASK | REQUIRE_ENCRYPTION | WHITESPACE_START_AKE | ERROR_START_AKE
DEFAULT number OPPORTUNISTIC
